text: (16 September 1895 - 24 April 1984) was a Japanese actor. He appeared in more than 160 films from 1940 to 1975. ==Career== Starting out in shingeki theater, Yanagi moved to shinpa and formed the Shinsei Shinpa theater troupe with Shōtaro Hanayagi in 1939. He also appeared as a supporting actor in many films. ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title ! title: Eijirō Yanagi
